comment: Great teacher, he makes learning about a mandatory general education course fun! Easy A and he's super nice!

Easy class. He takes attendance every day but I skipped almost every lecture day and still got an A in the class. Just make sure you go whenever there are in class activities and read through the powerpoints thoroughly before each test. Coach Charrette is a very nice and understanding guy. I would recommend his class to anyone who still needs HPS.

Not a hard class but very tedious. There are alot of assignments that need to be turned in. Test are harder than what you think. Class usually last about 30-40 min and skipping the chapter lecture days wont hurt you. Just make sure you actually study the ppt at home.
